item.itunes:subtitle: The CuteKid. baby photo contest gets featured at 10 News Click
item.itunes:summary: The review conducted at San Diego 10News.com covered details on how TheCuteKid.com's baby photo contest works, evaluation process and points to the chance of getting professional exposure from the Talent and Casting Agents that act as the sites Judges. 10news.com also mentioned that every contest entrant receives a yearly subscription to Parenting. magazine. The show described the prizes as "amazing" and categorically mentioned that the participants are evaluated by selected group of entertainment industry professionals and parents. Of course, the biggest news is the grand prize for the CuteKid of the Year . a $25,000 College Tuition Fund. "The coverage shows the confidence of visitors in TheCuteKid.com and is testament of the value created by the contest for parents. The CuteKid. is committed to bring the cute kids in the fore of entertainment and modeling industry." , remarked Greg Byrnes, Co-Founder.
